price: Istina je od Gospodara tvoga, pa zato nikako ne budi od onih koji sumnjaju.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takun mina al-mum'tarīna
